label: Princess Prep Back Window 2
description:
John takes the prybar and pulls off the boards.
He examines the window afterwards.  
There's a latch preventing the window from opening.

Hit 1 if you want John to use the loose nail on the latch.
Hit 2 if you want John to attempt to force the window with the prybar.
Hit 3 if you want John to try and find a loose rock or brick to break open the window.

Hit 0 to quit.
